Params: {3: "She's now only seven squares away from the finish line."}
{3: "DEAD MASTER follows closely behind, yet she's still one round away from catching up."}
{3: "If all goes well, she'll reach the finish line first, ensuring that the black side won't lose by having all its pieces eliminated early."}
{3: 'The real test comes next, when she has to simultaneously confront both DEAD MASTER and the "Knight" from the white side.'}
{3: "She recalls the image of a white-haired girl carrying an odachi, someone who, for some reason, hasn't joined the game since entering the castle."}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: "Now's not the time to think about that...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She looks at the number silently for a long while, her expression somewhat resigned.'}
{3: 'She was so close, just a single point away.'}
{3: 'With a sigh, she takes a step forward.'}
{3: 'Her footsteps echo down the long corridor, the finish line in sight, but she is forced to stop just short of it.'}
{3: 'And just as she steps on the final square...'}
{3: 'A white halo spreads from beneath her feet, plunging everything around into darkness.'}
{3: 'The card showing a castle flips, revealing the image of two crossed black swords.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She steadies her breath, hand resting on the long sword at her waist.'}
{3: 'An endless wilderness under a leaden sky.'}
{3: 'Countless figures emerge in the distance, surrounding her.'}
